nodes.text: Full Monty Catering is a food catering company that provided the food for the cast and crew of the 2015 sequel trilogy film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens at the scenes shot in Abu Dhabi. For the shoot, the company provided a craft services table, which included sandwiches, wraps, and quick bites. Their menu for the film was very much liquid based, as they provided shakes, smoothies, and slushees to keep the crew hydrated. The company is run by Nick Chapman, who called their energy bars and lemon iced tea the most popular items on the menu.

Chapman said in an interview that he loves working on set, and that it was enjoyable to work with director J.J. Abrams as well as producer Kathleen Kennedy. Full Monty Catering teased production of the film in 2014 by posting an image of the food for The Force Awakens on their Facebook with the caption "May the Craft be with you!."
